page.title: 04SCOTTOW
page.content: Most of the parish of Scottow lies outside this particular D-BLOCK. However the Church, the Hall and the Hall Farm are in the area. They are all situated in woodland to the north of the airfield at R.A.F. Coltishall and the airfield has in fact divided the village in two. {The Hall}is a large house built mainly in the Georgian style though there are traces of other periods. {The church}is dedicated to All Saints and is a large building and is in want of repair. A small commuinity live around the church and Hall. Most of the inhabitants work as agricultural workers.
